Posts.EditableText: Hey all, I am new to this and could use some help! So I've already started my game and got pretty far but I've realized I want to add a new room that is the FIRST room the player enters. Is there a way to create a new room and have it be the first one that the player is in without going back and changing what I already have? Any help would be appreciated
Posts.HTML:
Hey all, I am new to this and could use some help!

So I've already started my game and got pretty far but I've realized I want to add a new room that is the FIRST room the player enters. Is there a way to create a new room and have it be the first one that the player is in without going back and changing what I already have? Any help would be appreciated

Posts.EditableText: If I understand your question right, in the GUI, on the left where all the rooms and objects are, click on the player and drag it into the room you want them to start in.
Posts.HTML: If I understand your question right, in the GUI, on the left where all the rooms and objects are, click on the player and drag it into the room you want them to start in.

Posts.EditableText: Is there something specific I have to do to drag? I am using chrome and it doesn't seem like it's 'draggable'
Posts.HTML: Is there something specific I have to do to drag? I am using chrome and it doesn't seem like it's 'draggable'

Posts.EditableText: OK, I didn't realize you were using the web GUI. For that there's a button in the upper right hand side of the screen called 'Move'. Click on that when you're editing the player and it should work.
Posts.HTML: OK, I didn't realize you were using the web GUI. For that there's a button in the upper right hand side of the screen called 'Move'. Click on that when you're editing the player and it should work.

Posts.EditableText: Thank you so much that worked perfectly!
Posts.HTML: Thank you so much that worked perfectly!
